glsa.title: spice-gtk: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in spice-gtk could allow local attackers to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: spice-gtk is a set of GObject and Gtk objects for connecting to Spice servers and a client GUI.

description.p: spice-gtk does not properly sanitize the DBUS_SYSTEM_BUS_ADDRESS environment variable.

impact.p: A local attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All spice-gtk users should upgrade to the latest version:
